name: Deep Dive (Lossypi)
description:
Someone had to do it, right? 

Go down, fix it, get back up. Sounds simple enough. Now I'm stuck down here in search of that rusty and old mess of a station. 

You have a better view from up here, don't you? And that scanner of yours? Guess we can still make it through. 

At least it's quite down here...
